mapper.select: SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(A SYS_C0012988) */ NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(A.MNUM, -4)), 0) + 1 AS MNUM FROM KOSMO_PRODUCT A
SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(A SYS_C0012984) */ NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(A.KMNUM, -4)), 0) + 1 AS KMNUM FROM KOSMO_MEMBER A
SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(A SYS_C0013078) */ NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(A.MCNUM, -4)), 0) + 1 AS MCNUM FROM KOSMO_CART A
SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(A SYS_C0013161) */ NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(A.KBNUM, -4)), 0) + 1 KBNUM FROM KOSMO_BOARD A
